entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 6:00 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: W 17 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
